mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_animal ( region, lostDate, writerName, writerEmail, writerPhone, animalName, animalKind, animalKindMore, animalColor, animalSex, animalAge, lostPlace, specialMark, registNumber, image_uri ) VALUES ( #{region}, #{lostDate}, #{writerName}, #{writerEmail}, #{writerPhone}, #{animalName}, #{animalKind}, #{animalKindMore}, #{animalColor}, #{animalSex}, #{animalAge}, #{lostPlace}, #{specialMark}, #{registNumber}, #{image_uri} )
mapper.select: select aimg_file_name from animal_image where aimg_uri = #{uri} order by aimg_seq desc limit 1
